title: Iran Resolution, 2020, Impeachment
itunes:title: Iran Resolution, 2020, Impeachment
description:
Panel Guests: Joel Rubin, Democratic strategist and former deputy assistant secretary of state, Brad Blakeman, Republican Strategist and Former Deputy Assistant to Pres. George W. Bush and Guy Snodgrass, CEO of Defense Analytics, former director of communications and chief speechwriter to Secretary of Defense James Mattis and author of “Holding the Line: Inside Trump’s Pentagon with Secretary Mattis.” 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
